description: Contains information about patient's case insurance information.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INS_FILING_ORDER_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item identifies the patient's insurance as primary, secondary, or tertiary.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Primary


Secondary


Tertiary

columns.name: INS_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: This item contains the patient's insurance carrier.

columns.name: INS_PRODUCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the patient's insurance product type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: INS_SUBSCRIBER_NUM
columns.description: This item contains the patient's insurance subscriber ID.

columns.name: INS_SUBSCR_DOB_DT
columns.description: This item contains the patient's insurance subscriber date of birth.

columns.name: INS_POLICY_NUM
columns.description: This item contains the patient's insurance policy number.

columns.name: INS_GROUP_NUM
columns.description: This item contains the patient's insurance group number.

columns.name: INS_PRECERT_NUM
columns.description: This item contains the patient's insurance pre-cert number

columns.name: INS_PLAN_ID
columns.description: This item contains the patient's insurance plan.

columns.name: INS_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: INS_SUBSCRIBER_REL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Describes the Insurance Subscriber Relationship.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Aunt


Brother


Daughter


Father


Friend


Granddaughter


Grandfather


Grandmother


Grandson


Legal Guardian


Mother


Other


Step Father


Sister


Self


Step Mother


Son


Spouse


Uncle


Employer


Unverified Proxy


Transplant Recipient

columns.name: INS_PHONE_NUM
columns.description: Contains the phone number for insurance.
